channel.title: PI combat level glitch
channel.description:
Ehh i'm using insanityx, and when i'm maxed out it shows 126 combat on the weapon tab but too others it shows me as 138, any ideas on how to change that? Been getting alot of complaints about that.
help appreciated alot! :)

item.title: PI combat level glitch
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:443632”][quote author=s 3 3 m 3 link=topic=546312.msg4005103#msg4005103 date=1338524603]

Yes, which reminds me of another thing, hunter levels you up instead of summoning.

That error in specific would mean they set the combat gain to the wrong skill ID.

Don’t ask me how to fix I’m not a PI guy.

Oh my gosh. no wai. thanks for stating the obvious… You just fixed all my problems, but no really why post if your no help to me whatsoever.
[/quote]
You sure as hell didn’t act like you knew what you were talking about in the first place so don’t start it.
I would assume you can search the skill ID of the hunter skill and see where it gets calculated into the combat level equation and replace that with the summoning one.[/quote]

Okay thank you, appreciated.

Read full topic
